fko.chessly.mvc

Class ModelObservable

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • fko.chessly.mvc.ModelObservable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPlayer, Game, Playroom

    public class ModelObservable
extends java.util.Observable

    The ModelObservable class overrides notifyObserver(Object arg) to only allow ModelEvents objects as arguments: notifyObserver(ModelEvent me).

    Author:
    Frank Kopp (frank@familie-kopp.de)

    • Method Detail

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers(ModelEvent me)
        If this object has changed, as indicated by the hasChanged method, then notify all of its observers and then call the clearChanged method to indicate that this object has no longer changed.

        Each observer has its update method called with two arguments: this observable object and the ModelEvent me argument.

        Parameters:
        me - - a ModelEvent.
        See Also:
        Observable.clearChanged(), Observable.hasChanged(), Observer.update(java.util.Observable, Object)

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers(java.lang.Object arg)
        If this object has changed, as indicated by the hasChanged method, then notify all of its observers and then call the clearChanged method to indicate that this object has no longer changed.

        Each observer has its update method called with two arguments: this observable object and the arg argument.

        Overrides:
        notifyObservers in class java.util.Observable
        Parameters:
        arg - any object.
        See Also:
        Observable.clearChanged(), Observable.hasChanged(), Observer.update(java.util.Observable, Object)
